description:
This mod makes the game a little less grindy.

Changes:
 - Block stack size increased to 750
 - Blueprints usable in survival (press E when near a lift)
 - Haybots always drop component kits with a chance of a circuit board
 - Refining wood, stone, metal etc. will yield 30 items instead of 10
 - Refine time cut in half
 - Added Fertilizer recipes:
 * 10 blueberry, 10 orange, 10 banana seeds
 * 10 pineapple, 10 broccoli seeds
 * 30 potato seeds
 * 30 cotton seeds
name: Less Grind
